CodeFunctions_initialiseProject.name: CodeFunctions_initialiseProject
CodeFunctions_initialiseProject.description: Runs the initialise command from the .typedai.json configuration file

CodeFunctions_compileFormatLintTest.name: CodeFunctions_compileFormatLintTest
CodeFunctions_compileFormatLintTest.description: Compiles, lints and runs tests the project using the commands from the .typedai.json config file

CodeFunctions_queryRepository.name: CodeFunctions_queryRepository
CodeFunctions_queryRepository.description: Searches across files under the current working directory to provide an answer to the query
CodeFunctions_queryRepository.returns: The response from the query agent

CodeFunctions_findRelevantFiles.name: CodeFunctions_findRelevantFiles
CodeFunctions_findRelevantFiles.description: Selects a set of files relevant to the requirements provided.

parameters.name: requirements
parameters.description: The detailed requirements to implement, or a detailed natural language query about the repository codebase

requirements.description: The detailed requirements to implement, or a detailed natural language query about the repository codebase

CodeFunctions_findRelevantFiles.returns: A list of the relevant files
